color_usage.palette_style: playful pastel with high contrast accents

typography_style.font_case: uppercase for headers, sentence case for subheaders
typography_style.text_placement: left-aligned, overlaying neutral zones of the background or adjacent to key visual elements

lighting_and_vibe.highlighting: mild ambient glow on key elements

subject_placement.floating_elements: callouts and arrows placed around the subject
subject_placement.angle: mild perspective tilt for depth and realism

background_style.details: soft blur of sky and horizon to create airy depth

composition_layout.balance: weighted toward right with text offsetting on left
composition_layout.callout_positioning: diagonally connected to objects with icons or arrows

branding_elements.shapes: rounded rectangles and speech bubbles for emphasis
